column1: Uchi////The nigiri and sashimi are to die for. The uni (sea urchin) disintegrates into briny nectar on your tongue
column2: the unagi (eel) is soft and sweet
column3: and the hotate (scallop) is delicate and smooth. I anxiously await the day I can reasonably afford the omakase
column4: the multi-course chef's tasting. The servers are very knowledgeable about the dishes
column5: although they can sometimes come across as hurried and robotic. Uchi definitely runs like a well-oiled machine when it's busy. Take your time and savor every bite!
